ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Advice Sought
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Right, corrected it, sorry for the bad info. ... Hrmph, when I asked I was told eight, I never bothered to time it myself, and as I have very poor linear
ygData.messageBody:
>The Hermit is 20th, not 24th. He sometimes spawns at 21st, but not often.

Right, corrected it, sorry for the bad info.

>On Fennin Ro he spawns every three minutes, and it's been the same since I
>moved to Druzzil Ro. I've been camping him recently too with my 22nd
>Enchanter. Three minutes is really nice because you have to hustle to med
>and heal up in time for the next one if you want to catch him without his
>damage shield.


Hrmph, when I asked I was told eight, I never bothered to time it myself,
and as I have very poor linear time sense 8 could have been 3 *laughs*
again, sorry for trhe bad info.

Tszaaz E'Taurguin
